      • getColorFromString

        public static java.awt.Color getColorFromString(java.lang.String strColor)
        Returns a Color from a string representation as a hex value or a delimiter separated rgb values. The following are all valid arguments: 
         "#ffffff"
 "#FFFFFF"
 "255 255 255"
 "255,255,255"
 "255;255;255"
 "255-255-255"
 "255.255.255"
        Parameters:
        strColor -
        Returns:
        a Color from a string representation
